Action.Name: DlgBillboard.AddImage
Action.Description: Adds an image to a billboard control.

Arg.Name: ControlID
Arg.Description: The numeric ID of the billboard control.

Arg.Name: FilePath
Arg.Description: The path to the image file to add.

Arg.Name: Position
Arg.Description: The position in the list to add the image.

Action.Name: DlgBillboard.DeleteImage
Action.Description: Deletes an image from a billboard control.

Arg.Name: ControlID
Arg.Description: The numeric ID of the billboard control.

Arg.Name: Position
Arg.Description: The position of the image in the list to delete.

Action.Name: DlgBillboard.FillFromFolder
Action.Description: Fills a billboard control's images from a folder.

Arg.Name: ControlID
Arg.Description: The numeric ID of the billboard control.

Arg.Name: FolderPath
Arg.Description: The folder containing images to add to the billboard control.

Arg.Name: EmptyFirst
Arg.Description: Whether the billboard control should be emptied first.

Arg.Name: Recurse
Arg.Description: Whether the folder should be recursed.

Action.Name: DlgBillboard.GetCurrentImage
Action.Description: Get the index of the current image in a billboard control.

Arg.Name: ControlID
Arg.Description: The numeric ID of the billboard control.

Action.Name: DlgBillboard.GetImagePath
Action.Description: Gets the path to an image in a billboard control.

Arg.Name: ControlID
Arg.Description: The numeric ID of the billboard control.

Arg.Name: Position
Arg.Description: The position of the image to get the path of.

Action.Name: DlgBillboard.GetPos
Action.Description: Returns the X and Y screen coordinates of a billboard control in pixels.

Arg.Name: ControlID
Arg.Description: The numeric ID of the billboard control.

Action.Name: DlgBillboard.GetProperties
Action.Description: Returns a table containing the properties of the specified billboard control.

Arg.Name: ControlID
Arg.Description: The numeric ID of the billboard control.

Action.Name: DlgBillboard.GetSize
Action.Description: Returns the pixel dimensions of a billboard control.

Arg.Name: ControlID
Arg.Description: The numeric ID of the billboard control.

Action.Name: DlgBillboard.GetImageCount
Action.Description: Returns the number of images in a billboard control.

Arg.Name: ControlID
Arg.Description: The numeric ID of the billboard control.

Action.Name: DlgBillboard.GoToImage
Action.Description: Navigate to a specific image in a billboard control.

Arg.Name: ControlID
Arg.Description: The numeric ID of the billboard control.

Arg.Name: Position
Arg.Description: The position of the image to navigate to.

Action.Name: DlgBillboard.IsEnabled
Action.Description: Returns true if a specific billboard control is enabled, or false if it's disabled.

Arg.Name: ControlID
Arg.Description: The numeric ID of the billboard control.

Action.Name: DlgBillboard.IsVisible
Action.Description: Returns true if a specific billboard control is visible, and false if it isn't.

Arg.Name: ControlID
Arg.Description: The numeric ID of the billboard control.

Action.Name: DlgBillboard.Navigate
Action.Description: Navigates to an image in a billboard control.

Arg.Name: ControlID
Arg.Description: The numeric ID of the billboard control.

Arg.Name: NavigateType
Arg.Description: The type of navigation to perform.

Action.Name: DlgBillboard.Pause
Action.Description: Pauses a billboard control.

Arg.Name: ControlID
Arg.Description: The numeric ID of the billboard control.

Action.Name: DlgBillboard.Play
Action.Description: Plays a billboard control.

Arg.Name: ControlID
Arg.Description: The numeric ID of the billboard control.

Action.Name: DlgBillboard.SetEnabled
Action.Description: Sets the enabled/disabled state of a billboard control.

Arg.Name: ControlID
Arg.Description: The numeric ID of the billboard control.

Arg.Name: Enabled
Arg.Description: Whether to make the billboard control enabled or disabled.

Action.Name: DlgBillboard.SetPos
Action.Description: Sets the X and Y pixel coordinates of a billboard control relative to the screen.

Arg.Name: ControlID
Arg.Description: The numeric ID of the billboard control.

Arg.Name: X
Arg.Description: The new X pixel coordinate (horizontal position) to set for the billboard control. This is the X coordinate of the upper left hand corner of the control's bounding box relative to the current screen.

Arg.Name: Y
Arg.Description: The new Y pixel coordinate (vertical position) to set for the billboard control. This is the Y coordinate of the upper left hand corner of the control's bounding box relative to the current screen.

Action.Name: DlgBillboard.SetProperties
Action.Description: Sets the properties of a billboard control on the current screen.

Arg.Name: ControlID
Arg.Description: The numeric ID of the billboard control.

Arg.Name: Properties
Arg.Description: A table containing the properties you want to modify in the billboard control, indexed by name.

Action.Name: DlgBillboard.SetSize
Action.Description: Sets the size of a billboard control.

Arg.Name: ControlID
Arg.Description: The numeric ID of the billboard control.

Arg.Name: Width
Arg.Description: The new width of the billboard control.

Arg.Name: Height
Arg.Description: The new height of the billboard control.

Action.Name: DlgBillboard.SetVisible
Action.Description: Sets the visibility of a billboard control.

Arg.Name: ControlID
Arg.Description: The numeric ID of the billboard control.

Arg.Name: Visible
Arg.Description: Whether to make the billboard control visible or invisible.
